name: Penguin Panic (Jett Lee)
description:
The browser build for this game is a bit scuffed, for the most optimal experience; please download the game!

Check out how it was made here!

-----------

Entry for Ludum Dare 50

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/$282570

-----------

As a penguin, you find yourself stranded on a sinking iceberg. No big deal, rescue is on the way! 

However, other penguins want to get on this iceberg, but it can only hold so much weight! 

Be the last penguin standing until you get rescued!

-----------

Controls:

Arrows = Move / Jump

Mouse = Aim + Shoot / Select Spell Card
